# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(datagen LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(datagen "")
set_target_properties(datagen PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "datagen")
set_target_properties(datagen PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_compile_options(datagen PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET datagen PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(datagen PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(datagen PRIVATE
    code/datagen.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(ma "")
set_target_properties(ma PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "ma")
set_target_properties(ma PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_compile_options(ma PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET ma PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(ma PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(ma PRIVATE
    code/brute_force.cpp
    code/divide_conque.cpp
    code/dp.cpp
    code/ma.cpp
    code/brute_force.hpp
    code/dp.hpp
    code/divide_conque.hpp
)
